Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 11:35:43
Folder: C14P0PE - live with excom, sol3mates new drop, transform tuesdays
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C14P0PE_00
From: Internal News <internalnews@onechalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-06-17 12:24
Subject: Live with ExCom, SOL3MATES | New Drop, Transform Tuesdays
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/f6f94f4f0a77d3a52f8897f5c482fd51836209232.gif> 	

Today, we hear from two key voices shaping our business and our culture, Tracey (Group CFO) and Wassim (President, People & Culture), as they share honest reflections and forward-looking focus areas.

Watch the videos here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1256&user=10620>  and remember to submit your questions anonymously in advance here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1257&user=10620> .​

Register here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1258&user=10620> 



Tracey shares a candid reflection on our H1 performance, the wins and the challenges and focuses on the Portfolio Optimisation Project, aimed at prioritising what drives the most value for 2026​.

Tracey shares a candid reflection on our H1 performance, the wins and the challenges and focuses on the Portfolio Optimisation Project, aimed at prioritising what drives the most value for 2026​.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1256&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1256&user=10620> 	



Wassim highlights how we’re enabling high performance through culture and leadership and the power of every team member in driving our Group’s success. 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

SOL3MATES | 
New Drop

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/83befa5e8cb5bce0db6f312e386313391496814813.gif> 	







SOL3MATES has just dropped their new colorway from the 320s collection – All White.

Check them out here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1259&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-3-min.png> 	

Transform Tuesdays

Logistics is getting faster, smarter, and more connected. With real-time tracking, proactive compliance, and end-to-end integration, we’re simplifying every step of the supply chain — from DCs to last-mile delivery.

What does seamless logistics mean for your day-to-day?

Join the conversation here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1260&user=10620> .
